courseSectionInformation: Credit is not given for both MSE 304 and PHYS 460. Prerequisite: PHYS 214.
description: Electronic structure and bonding of materials, electrical conduction in metals and semiconductors, and dielectric and magnetic properties of solids. Credit is not given for both MSE 304 and PHYS 460. Prerequisite: PHYS 214.
label: Electronic Properties of Matls
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Materials Science & Engr major(s).
